transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji, kaun?

Executive: Aapko call aaya hai.

Customer: Pankaj baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office se. Praveen ji se baat ho rahi hai kya?

Executive: Yes yes, bolijiye bolijiye. 
Praveen ji Pankaj baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Actually aapka jo Asian cinematics ka catalog run kar raha hai na IndiaMART us related discussion hua tha aapse hai na Renold ko lekar ke.

Customer: To aapse us din aapne bola

Executive: Renold bata deta hun December mein payment hua tha sir aapka Trustil service ke liye two year service ka hai na. Aur abhi jo aapse discussion chal raha tha pricing ko lekar ke chal raha hai. Services aapka December tak hi hai. Lekin jo prices hai na jo aapne payment kiya tha 60 plus GST ka amount payment karwaya tha aapne 2023 mein. Abhi jo hamara Trustil two year service ka price chal raha hai wo 80000 plus GST chal raha hai two years ke liye. Lekin aapko Diwali offer ki vajah se aapki company mein price bhi hold karwaya tha humne 70 plus GST ka hold karwaya tha. Usi related aapko call kar rahe the message bhi kiya lekin aapka koi bhi revert aaya nahi sir.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: To aap aap ha aap mujhe confirm kar dijiye ki aap kya karna chah rahe hain. Next month hi karna chah rahe hain ya fir next month karenge to wohi 80 plus GST pe rahega aapka. Abhi karenge 70 plus GST pe rahega aur remaining ka one month jo hai aapka bacha hua wo add on ho jayega usi mein. Validity.

Customer: Hmm. Mere ko time lagta hai ji thoda sa.

Executive: To abhi nahi karna chah rahe basically aap?

Customer: Nahi hai thoda sa cost jyada hai.

Executive: Han ji sir.

Customer: Cost jyada hai na.

Executive: Cost jyada aa rahi lag rahi hai. To three years ka kar lijiye three years ka aapko rahega sir ispe cost aayega three years ka aapko 1 lakh plus GST ka cost karega sir Trustil three years.

Customer: Ji cost jyada hai ji cost jyada hai.

Executive: To fir sir decision aapka pricing to yahi rahega sir. Ye to main old prices de raha hun 70 plus GST jo rahega Trustil two year ka rahega ha aapke liye Trustil three year agar aap jate ho to jyada se jyada ye ho jayega aapko Trustil three year ka old price 90 plus GST 90 plus GST pe ho jayega aapka Trustil three year. To per year jo cost aapne 60 plus GST two year ka diya tha 90 plus GST three years ka ho jayega to 30 per year 30000 plus GST cost aayega per year ka.

Customer: Per year ka 30 plus GST.

Executive: Ha per year ka 30 plus GST cost ho jayega na. Three year service pe 90 plus GST pad raha hai aapko. To jo last amount aapne payment kiya hai ha three years mein to wohi ha ha ji sir.

Customer: Ha 90 plus GST ji.

Executive: Okay. To price price one year ka usi price pe. Han ji sir. Mere hum ready. Han ji sir. Us us price mein one year de do mere ko. Sir one year to us price mein abhi aapko malum hai basic service bhi 32 plus GST hai one year ka basic service. Nahi main hai na thoda sa bahar hun baat karta hun thoda free hoke. Ha aap mere ko isi number pe connect kar lijiyega Praveen ji hai na. Whatsapp okay whatsapp mein. Okay okay. Ha maine whatsapp
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer finds the cost to be high.

- Wants one year subscription at old price.



Resolution:

- Executive explained pricing for 2 and 3 years.

- Executive offered 3 year plan at 90k plus GST.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect later on same number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, pricing, trustseal, gst
